description: Farther back in time, Marko Pacyna and Nikolas Kiss recall an armed victory while younger comrades Franco Corsini and Jozsef Kovacs listen in.  Nikolas complains that Marko enjoyed the fleshy spoils of victory without him and Marko decides to give Nikolas a chance to celebrate by stroking, kissing, and stripping him out of uniform.  Franco and Jozsef follow their lead and soon the two pairs are stripped to the bone.  The stroke and suck their way into a frenzy.  Marko takes a turn fucking Nikolas as Franco sits down on Jozsef's cock.  The rhythm increases and one by one each stud blows his load.
title: The Conquest, Scene #02
